Type Alias# Float.SIMDMaskScalar

iOS 8.0+iPadOS 8.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.10+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias SIMDMaskScalar = Int32
```

## [See Also](/documentation/Swift/Float/SIMDMaskScalar#see-also)

### [SIMD-Supporting Types](/documentation/Swift/Float/SIMDMaskScalar#SIMD-Supporting-Types)

[`struct SIMD2Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd2storage)Storage for a vector of two floating-point values.[`struct SIMD4Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd4storage)Storage for a vector of four floating-point values.[`struct SIMD8Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd8storage)Storage for a vector of eight floating-point values.[`struct SIMD16Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd16storage)Storage for a vector of 16 floating-point values.[`struct SIMD32Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd32storage)Storage for a vector of 32 floating-point values.[`struct SIMD64Storage`](/documentation/swift/float/simd64storage)Storage for a vector of 64 floating-point values.
